title: Ep 522 | Jase Calls Out Hollywood & Phil Recalls Robertson Domino Games
description:
Jase points out the one huge movie trait that shows Hollywood filmmakers are unable to create what they do not already know. Al finds an old table that reminds him of Robertson family domino nights, and Phil explains the different rules for trash-talking your brother and your uncle. Jase jokes that he represents the most "non-educated" person in the family. Al laughs at Jase's stories about growing up in a different era from today's kids.
